title: Crime Alert 02.04.19
itunes:title: Crime Alert 02.04.19
description:
Facebook video allegedly shows mom Caitlin Hardy waterboarding her sleeping baby. Connecticut inmate asks another prisoner asking him to kill his brother-in-law for $5,000. New Jersey Girl Scout leader Jessica Medina claims thieves stole over a $1,000 in cookie money, but her story crumbles.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
